hizbs.text: avar etearu karyattil abhiprayavyatyasattilayi kkeantirikkunnuvea atinepparri
vintum nis'sansayam; avar valiye arinnu keallum
ninnalkk mite balisthamaya elu akasannal nam nirmikkukayum
kattijvalikkunna oru vilakk nam untakkukayum ceytirikkunnu
karmeghannalil ninn kutti olukunna vellam nam irakkukayum ceytu
atu mukhena dhan'yavum sasyavum nam purattu keantu varan venti
atayat kahalattil utappetukayum, ninnal kuttankuttamayi vannettukayum ceyyunna divasam
akasam turakkappetukayum ennittat pala kavatannalayi tirukayum ceyyum
parvvatannal sancarippikkappetukayum annane ava maricika peale ayittirukayum ceyyum
nam'mute drstantannale avar tirttum nisedhiccu tallukayum ceytu
atinal ninnal (siksa) asvadiccu kealluka. tirccayayum nam ninnalkku siksayallateannum vard'dhippiccu tarikayilla
avite anavasyamaya oru vakkea oru vyajavarttayea avar kelkkukayilla
(at‌) ninre raksitavinkal ninnulla oru pratiphalavum, kanakkeatta oru sam'manavumakunnu
akasannaluteyum bhumiyuteyum avakkitayilullatinreyum raksitavum paramakarunikanumayullavanre (sam'manam.) avanumayi sambhasanattil erpetan avarkku sadhikkukayilla
ruhum malakkukalum aniyayi nilkkunna divasam. paramakarunikanaya allahu anuvadam nalkiyittullavanum satyam parannittullavanumallate ann sansarikkukayilla
atatre yathart'thamaya divasam. atinal vallavanum uddesikkunna paksam tanre raksitavinkalekkulla matakkattinre margam avan svikarikkatte

asannamaya oru siksaye parri tirccayayum ninnalkku nam munnariyipp nalkiyirikkunnu. manusyan tanre kaikal munkutti ceytu veccat neakkikkanukayum, ayyea nan mannayirunnenkil etra nannayirunnene enn satyanisedhi parayukayum ceyyunna divasam
ennittu munneattu kuticcu peakunnava tanneyana, satyam
avar parayum: tirccayayum nam (nam'mute) munsthitiyilekk matakkappetunnavaranea
avar parayukayan‌: annaneyanenkil nastakaramaya oru tiriccuvaravayirikkum at‌
tvuva enna parisud'dha tal‌varayil vecc addehattinre raksitav addehatte vilicc iprakaram paranna sandarbham
ni phir'aunre atuttekku peakuka. tirccayayum avan atirukavinnirikkunnu
ennitt ceadikkuka: ni parisud'dhi prapikkan tayyaruntea
ninre raksitavinkalekk ninakk nan vali kaniccutaram. ennitt ni bhayappetanum (tayyaruntea
annane addeham (musa) avann a mahattaya drstantam kaniccukeatuttu
appeal avan nisedhiccu tallukayum dhikkarikkukayum ceytu
pinne, avan etir sramannal natattuvanayi pintirinnu peayi
annane avan (tanre alkkare) sekhariccu. ennittu vilambaram ceytu
nan ninnalute atyunnatanaya raksitavakunnu enn avan parannu
appeal paraleakattileyum ihaleakattileyum siksaykkayi allahu avane pitikuti
ninnalanea srstikkappetan kututal prayasamullavar. atalla; akasamanea? atine avan nirmiccirikkunnu
atinre vitanam avan uyarttukayum, atine avan vyavasthappetuttukayum ceytirikkunnu
atile ratriye avan iruttakkukayum, atile pakaline avan pratyaksappetuttukayum ceytirikkunnu
atil ninn atile vellavum sasyajalannalum avan purattu keantuvarikayum ceytirikkunnu
ennal a maha vipatt varunna sandarbham
atayatu manusyan tan ad'dhvaniccu veccatinepparri ormikkunna divasam
appeal etearal tanre raksitavinre sthanatte bhayappetukayum manas'sine tannistattil ninn vilakkinirttukayum ceytuvea
a antyasamayattepparri, ateppealan sambhavikkuka enn avar ninneat ceadikkunnu
